name: Dolls' Asylum
description:
This game is a 3D FPS horror game.
Where the protagonist, falled in a backroom full of monster nurse who turn people into dolls.    

Would you find the key and exit the backroom ?

Controls:

  • WASD to move. 
  • LShift to Run
  • [F] to turn on/off the flashlight
  • LControl to Hide
  • Num 1 to 8 to select a pose
  • Left Click to use the hide minigame
